channel.title: Scientific Computing @ Emory on Emory Scientific Computing Group
channel.description: Recent content in Scientific Computing @ Emory on Emory Scientific Computing Group

item.title: Schedule
item.description: Meetings of the Scientific Computing Group will be held once a week, 2:00–3:00 in W301. The meetings will usually be on Friday, but occasionally we will meet at other times. For specifics, see the schedule below. Some food (e.g., pizza) will normally be provided once every month, and participants are welcome to bring their own lunch to other meetings. Entertainment will normally consist of a seminar talk. First year graduate students and undergraduates interested in scientific computing are welcome to attend.
